text: Yesterday I was chased by tsunami countermeasures and support measures for the Chile earthquake, I could not update blogs or tweet, but I tried everything to minimize the damage of the tsunami. Today, upon request from the Chilean Government, we sent a medical team immediately.

The closing ceremony of the Vancouver 2010 Olympic Games was held. I got a great impression from the battle over the 17 days, five medals, from every game. All the players and stakeholders, thanks for your hard work. Thank you! I'm also looking forward to the Paralympics from March 12.

From today, "suicide measures strengthening month" to protect the life begins. As part of that, the government will also develop sleep campaigns. If you feel tired but you can not sleep anymore, please consult your doctor. http://bit.ly/dmSxq9
The ASLG launches its website - www.theaslg.com - check out what the leaders in sustainability are doing in the Arab Region
For the Arab speakers amongst you, check out this blog about my trip down memory lane to Egypt yesterday http://bit.ly/bVthJr

Today's budget passed the House of Representatives. Although I was relieved, I finally got back at the marathon turning point. I still can not get out of my mind! It is deliberation at the Upper House from tomorrow.
Out of good and fruitful conversation with Hillary Clinton. We talked about reconstruction post earthquake, democracy, energy, technology and future

It is a meeting from now. It is a pleasant morning. Although I am lying to say that I am not sleepy. Recently, it gets a little bright even at the same 6 o'clock, I feel the arrival of spring. Today is the Upper House Budget Committee. I would like to discuss the policy firmly.
Tape record for confidence in Thailand. I talk to the news people. http://www.pm.go.th/media/confidence/11350

I met Japanese Americans who are active in various fields in the USA. I talked about the hot feeling that I wanted to be a "bridge" between Japan and the United States. I am happy. I realized that Japanese Americans are enriching Japan-US relations.
Is on their way to visit Rosenberg shipyard in Stavanger #Samarbeid
Congratulations to Anette Sagen for a great opening race in the new Holmenkollen!

President Chun Mary was visited Japan at the milestone of the 55th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between Japan and Laos. It seems that a bridge constructed by Japanese ODA is designed for banknotes in Laos. The development of Laos located in the center of the Mekong region is important for the region. We will further deepen our cooperation. http://bit.ly/9 MJunz
Friends: www.levantemoschile.cl

The Chile earthquake, the safety of all the Japanese local people was able to be confirmed. It is fortunate that there were no human injuries due to the tsunami in Japan, but I would like to express my heartfelt condolences to all who suffered from the fishery. I wrote the government response etc to e-mail magazine. http://bit.ly/90j3WR
On the way to Kristiansand. First @SteinarJOlsen and Stormberg about inclusive working life, then talk for county council meeting in Vest-Agder Ap # cooperation

Today, I saw the scene of recycling personal computers · mobile phones and vending machines, power generation using methane gas from food waste, recycling construction waste materials, I felt a spirit to support "vein industry" in everyone's story . I will continue to think firmly what something the country can do to protect the life of the earth.
Now the economy is recovering. The problem is that Map Ta Phut case. The board is taking care of it.
The political crisis will have a big rally next week. But the government has prepared a plan. Based on the law. And not violent
Have today learned a lot about the workforce of employees in Stormberg and @steinarjolsen. Great annual meeting and good post at Vest-Agder Ap.
Thailand's Prime Minister Abhisit Vejjajiva,
Today I went to the grandson 's shrine visited in January. When you are looking at the grandchild's face laughing or crying, it makes me feel uncomfortable.
Prime Minister discusses drought problem with representatives from Chinese government http://bit.ly/bRXccF
Happy Women's Day. To open the Aps Equality Conference and visit an integration project at Solvang Nursing Home. #womanday # cooperation

Today is "International Women's Day", I also gave mimosa flowers to female reporters, modestly. Did you know this anniversary? It is a day when United Nations member states aimed at recognizing women's equal social participation again.
Have visited Solvang Nursing Home, and is impressed with the work of gender equality and inclusion. Video: http://bit.ly/cQNqPY #work #inclusion
Great way to kick off Int'l Women's Day with first woman ever to win Best Director at Oscars!
#Kathryn Bigelow now a role model for aspiring female managers - which we need! Less than 10% of films are directed by women.
The hope is one day a woman winning an award will be the norm and not the headline. But we girls need to work at it!
(Oh! And what a bump for #Jordan, too! #Hurt Locker filmed here!)

When I thought that a warm day continued for several days, a cold day came and it is difficult to manage my condition. I am particularly careful after becoming prime minister. I sneezed a little bit last week, but I cured it. It may be light pollen allergy. There seems to be a day when the difference of coldness is still intense. Please also take care.
And if u liked the Jordanian landscape, grab a DVD of Capt Abu Raed, our 1st ever feature film.

Today I attended the deliberation of the child allowance bill at the Health Labor Relations Committee of the House of Representatives. Child care allowance to support children 's growth in society as a whole. We will establish it by March and aim for start of payment from June.
Prime interview Government will not take violence. Do not panic. But do not underestimate
The Prime Minister called the meeting to focus on the mission is to maintain peace during the assembly. http://ow.ly/1gOGO
On way 2 NY, already missing my little ones. Last thing my 5yr old said: "Mummy, why can not u take us with u everywhere u go?"
Best offer I've had in ages. If only it was doable!

I met Tang Dynasty, China side chairman and Nishimuro Taizo · Japan side chairman of the "New Japan-China Friendship 21st Century Committee". For the further development of the relationship between Japan and China, I have heard the hot thoughts on cooperation that touches the heart 's string.

The real dove cafe, which we received many hopeful participation last time in the last time, will do the second time. The theme is "food and agriculture cafe". Please apply, including work related to food, those involved in agriculture, and students aiming for that road. Please check this out for details. http://bit.ly/92 Irr 3

Today, the Cabinet decided the basic bill to combat global warming. We also aim to reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 25% by 2020, while also urging efforts by major emissions countries. To protect the life of the earth, everyone, please cooperate.
The Paralympic Games will start from today. I look forward to seeing it on news and relay. Everyone at the players, we also told you at the rallying party, but please do your best and do your best!

Today, I heard stories from local companies and children 's homes at Nara. I saw the manufacturing site of the pharmaceutical company and herbal medicinal garden, I came to the healthy children at the facility, I felt the response to the future at the ancient capital · Nara. With the capital of the capital of 1300, it was a breathtaking feeling for the prospect of the "Great Columns" restored as it was.

It gradually became warmer and the carp in the pond of the official residence awoke from hibernation and swam. As there is only one small person, it seems to be overwhelmed by a big carp, so I'm rooting for "trying hard".
http://bit.ly/bAVkdu

Budget conference at Thorbjørnrud http://bit.ly/12TF87
Miserable weather in NYC, but was inspired by stories of hardship & heroism frm women near & far. http://bit.ly/cD4zV4
It's this will & strength that's gotten us so far, but there's much distance to cover.
Caught up w / women I admire for their accomplishments, as well as way they gently nudged me along in my life, nt least Hillary Clinton.
HC - a woman who's done so much to raise the bar & expand horizons for women all over the world.
All thru her hard work, strength of conviction, and an unwavering desire to serve.
Was up early with jetlag, but have a good HALF day for myself. Hooray! Will spend it catching up with friends.

At the Paralympic Games, Women's Rotating Sitting position, the Asuka players were bronze medals. congratulations. It seems that the Asuka players are the ninth medal in five consecutive tournaments. great!
Thailand's Prime Minister Abhisit Vejjajiva http://www.pm.go.th/media/confidence/12892 (team)

Half years since the administration was inaugurated. I have been running running with the aim of "politics to protect life". It is another step until realization such as child allowance, free high school grant, improvement of medical care, agricultural door compensation system etc. are realized. We also reduced waste due to business sorting. However, criticisms such as politics and money problems are also received. I will try on my return to the beginning when the administration is inaugurated!

We do not leave the materials and basic data that we use right away, as a secretary, leaving it in handy to carry around. The days have increased as the days passed, handbags became heavier. I also feel the weight of responsibility. http://bit.ly/bryfg6

The second round of business sorting which became a topic in "Hissatsu Sorting Person" will begin under Minano Minano from April. This time, it is subject to the business of independent administrative agencies and public benefit corporations. I wrote this in the mail magazine. http://bit.ly/bdnvRk

at Pan-African media conference:"It is up to politicians to make African integration work, otherwise we remain weak & divided"
Finance Minister Sigbjørn Johnsen invites students to join the blog competition http://bit.ly/bbAhr0 #samarbejde

Nordic ski distance of the Vancouver · Paralympic Games In the men's 10 kilogram class standing, Yoshihiro Nitta won the gold medal. It is the first gold medal in the tournament. Congratulations. I am proud.
Thanks for all the encouragement from the netizens.

At the committee of the Conference of the Parties to the Convention of the Washington Treaty, proposal ban proposal banned by bluefin tuna was rejected. I am glad that Japan's assertions were understood. We will continue to strive to allow the world people to taste the deliciousness of tuna while admonishing overfishing and supporting the development of Japanese technology such as aquaculture.

Today I interfered with elderly nursing home in Tokyo. People in the elderly who are encouraged to rehabilitate to live healthily at home and are receiving homely and careful care, were lively. I also tried using a rehabilitation tool to train muscle of the foot, but it is surprisingly hard. http://bit.ly/cmztuz
is on my way to Steinkjer. Looking forward to exciting political debate at the county council meeting in Nord-Trøndelag.
has begun and heard of exciting political debate in Steinkjer. Here you can see our video port: http://bit.ly/74Z9m #apmedlem

Today is Spring Equinox Day. From the car going to the Imperial Palace at the event, I could see the cherry blossoms already blooming. I hope the wind is so strong that I will not scatter. Although it may be that some of the flower-viewing schedule will deviate if it blooms too early, I am looking forward to the full-fledged visit of spring.

Today I took a helicopter from the roof of the official residence and attended the graduation ceremony of the Defense Academy. We talked about the importance of perspectives of both "continuation" and "change" in the defense policy before the egg of the executive SDF. I thought reliably the young people 's glorious appearance of the next generation of Japanese defense.
3 days until #Twestival! Join 200+ cities around the world March 25 to raise awareness & money for ... you guessed it! EDUCATION!
#DidYouKnow: globally, 72 million children, mostly girls, are not enrolled in school. PLZ RT then get involved! Twestival.com

The Paralympics is also closed. There are 11 Japanese medals, including the second gold medal of Nitta. It was a medal rush. Activity of Eye Sledge Hockey team is also impressive. I am looking forward to seeing you all who came home.
2 days until #Twestival! Tweet & Meet to give support to education. Check out Twestival.com to find out how.
#DidYouKnow: a woman or girl will reinvest 90% of their income into the family; a man just 30-40%. PLZ RT then get involved! Twestival.com
#Twest a great online / offline synergy for social change. Here's another: # 1GOAL! Sign up to support Education for All at join1goal.org!

Two recipients of Northern Territory High School student speech contest visited the official residence. There are young people seriously considering the Northern Territories issue. When I became an adult I made a decision to negotiate more vigorously so that this problem has already become a thing of the past.

The criminal of Chinese made frozen dumplings was arrested by Chinese police authorities. In addition to evaluating the efforts of the Chinese side, we will continue to cooperate with each other and aim for early settlement. I hope this will allow further development of Japan - China relations.
After the vernal equinox days, warm days have also increased. When you are walking in the garden of the official residence, the change of the season is felt by the skin.
Remembering a month since the earth shook under our feet and the sea lashed our shores. Now all together to lift chile
Departing from a simple and emotional ceremony, in front of the cathedral of conception, in memory of the victims of the earthquake.

During the weekend I stayed in Kamogawa, Chiba Prefecture, looking over the horizon and thinking about future issues. When viewing the wide sea in this way, the field of view expands and the motivation springs up in a moment. http://bit.ly/cxQOwQ

I met with Prime Minister Somare of Papua New Guinea. He is longing for me as a "founding father" since independence in 1975. Fertile islands in the South Pacific are threatened with climate change. We also confirmed cooperation towards COP 16 with Prime Minister Somare.
Happy Passover to all! -! Happy holiday to all the house of Israel http://bit.ly/9czLfm

I decided to award the Prime Minister a prize to the captain of the great sumo wrestlers. Kaigo Seki is the 100th place in the Makuuchi prefecture and the 823 victories in the Makuuchi voting at the earlier spring studio, both being the ranks first and the attitude to serve as a balos for a long time is also a model of the people. In honor of the efforts of Kaigo Seki, I hope that the sumo wrestler will become more and more energetic.
Prime Minister visits Bahrain http://ow.ly/1sY5i
Have written about the value of volunteering http://bit.ly/cFQZKH Thanks to all those who help make Easter easter safer!

Today was the second session of the party debate. Liberal Democratic Party President Tanigaki and Komeito's Yamaguchi representative made the debate over the relocation of the Futenma airport relocation, postal reform, politics and money problems. I think that we could have serious discussions.
Today we decided not to renew the state of catastrophe and maintain the presence of the Armed Forces, evolving from the rifle to the shovel, hammer and reconstruction.
